About Me

Bio

I'm Aino, a software engineering student at LUT University
who is enthuastic about learning new programming languages and technologies.

My dream and career goal is to become front-end or software developer, with the longer-term aspiration of moving into UI design. Improving usability of software is important topic to me and something I would like to work with.

Besides studying, I enjoy knitting and playing video games.
Frisbeegolf, badminton and hiking are also close to my heart.
